website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive bat has plenty of durability to stand up to whatever young kids throw at it.
pros: Extremely durable T-ball bat consisting of an ALX50 aircraft-grade alloy aluminum
Comfortable handle with grippy material to keep the bat in the child’s hands
Available in three different lengths, each with a minus-10 drop
Has a one-piece design, so it will last a long time, even if the kid doesn’t treat it as well as he or she should
cons: Not made to handle regulation baseballs
Only for use with soft T-balls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bat for home defense!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome light weight little bat, it sits behind my bedroom door! Just in case I need it one day!
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Zero pop. Better off using a large wooden dowell.
customer_reviews.text: My son that’s using this is five years old. He’s got a pretty good swing but this bad does not let the ball pop off of the barrel. I am not a fan of USA bats. If your league allows USSSA bats then use those.
customer_reviews.author: ZacAttack

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: I’m admittedly not an expert on teeball bats, just needed something for my 5 year old that meets the new USA baseball standards. I think this is a steal for the price. This is his first season and he hits the ball as well as anyone. His coach even picked it for all the kids to use for their professional pictures because ‘it’s the nicest bat [he’s] ever seen.’
customer_reviews.author: Leah M

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, affordable, trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: There’s just no need, at the youth level, to spend an exorbitant amount of money for a high-end bat, when you know full-well that the materials that comprise the bat are the same. This is well-made, it comes from a reputable name, and it’s incredibly affordable. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller kids in the coach pitch leagues!
customer_reviews.text: Had a young man on my daughters 8-10 youth baseball coach pitch team, and noticed he was having trouble with the bats the kids had and the ones that the park dist. supplied. Got this one for him, and he was swingin' for the downs! Great bat for t-ball and youth!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sizing options
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes your local sporting goods store will not always have the variety of sizes. For some smaller t ball players, the smaller 24/14 size will really make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great bat for my daughter to use in t-ball. It is longer and heavier than her teammates bats. You can see in the picture with all of the bats hanging, hers hangs lower than the others. All in all a wonderful bat for her.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for my new Tee Ball player!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old has been very happy with this bat. I was not sure what size bat to get for a new tee-ball player. This turned out to be perfect, and I'm sure it will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good weight
customer_reviews.text: The bat is great with a caveat that the length button at the butt of the batt isn’t centered making it raised. Bothers me but won’t affect the bat and my son doesn’t care
customer_reviews.author: Schkot

customer_reviews.title: Toddler size!!
customer_reviews.text: This is toddler size !!! I did not read the full description...very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice bat. My son was very happy. A lot of his teammates use this bat too.
customer_reviews.author: locknload

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FEEL
customer_reviews.text: A VERY NICE BAT, GIVEN TO MY FIVE-YEAR-OLD GRANDSON. IT FELT SOLID AND STRONG IN MY OWN HANDS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: It worked, gave my kid lots of magic every ball was a homer in that had glitter bombs with every single ball to bat contact!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8u
customer_reviews.text: Great bat for 8u but a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: DCNeil

customer_reviews.title: Bat dented very easily on 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Took my 8 year old son out for the first time with this bat. He hit around 20 balls and after we noticed a quarter sized dent in the bat. Very disappointed coming from a brand like Easton. Wasn't an expensive purchase, but would expect the bat to be able to hold up to an 8 year old hitting balls off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for tball
customer_reviews.text: As described. Great for my 4 year old in tball
customer_reviews.author: Kylie J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TBall Bat
customer_reviews.text: Bat is the perfect weight and size for little tballers
customer_reviews.author: mattyc04

customer_reviews.title: Not hard material. Will dent
customer_reviews.text: Bat is nice and light. Well balanced but not hard material. My 6 year old son put all kinds of dents in it every time he hit a ball at his farm games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bat for my 6 yr old - nice and light!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Grandson’s first bat
customer_reviews.text: Great starter bat for tee ball. Light enough to easily swing and like all Easton products has a quality feel
customer_reviews.author: Jb5559

customer_reviews.title: The first time I’ve used this
customer_reviews.text: Because it’s the first time I’ve been waiting for this
customer_reviews.author: CookieFactory

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived early which was awesome because I needed it by this Tuesday, and it was perfect weight for my 3.5 year to start tball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Indentations with Limited Use
customer_reviews.text: The bat was purchased in February 2019 and has only been used for six practices in the batting cage by a seven year old as of March 2019. It was disappointing to find three medium to large indentations on the bat from hitting a baseball. EDIT: The bat was unusable a few months later.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Its short and light, perfect for the littlest ones on the team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Our kid loves this bat and it’s perfect for Tball!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth_S

customer_reviews.title: Great for T-ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat for my six-year-old to use in T-ball. Turned out it really helped him hit And get the ball out there
customer_reviews.author: Tori Myers

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this bat!
customer_reviews.text: Great bat for my son - he loves it and I love seeing him tear into the ball with it! Good quality bat and you can't ask for anything more in a T-Ball bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily
customer_reviews.text: The bat got a dent in it on the first pitch the child hit, enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bat for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great bat for my 4 year old. Hits the ball really good
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA MAIRENA

customer_reviews.title: Good for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 1/2 and this bat is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this bat for maybe a month and it has 3 huge dents in the bat from him hitting the ball! 😑
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Wells

customer_reviews.title: Dented in second game use.
customer_reviews.text: Bat got a large dent in second 6-year old game.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great first bat
customer_reviews.text: Great first bat. My talk 6 year old used it for coach pitch
customer_reviews.author: C. White

product_meta.title: EASTON Beast -10 (2 1/4") USA Youth / Kids Tee Ball Baseball Bat | 2019 | 1 Piece Aluminum | ALX50 Alloy | Comfort Grip
product_meta.description: The 2018-19 Easton Beast -10 Tee Ball bat is perfect for young players looking for more contact and power. The 2-1/4” barrel one-piece design is constructed of lightweight and durable ALX50 Aircraft Grade Alloy, with a rolled end and All-Sports grip, for better hold and comfort. This bat is approved for play in leagues and associations that follow the USA Baseball standard.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and durable ALX50 Aircraft Grade Alloy construction
Only for use with approved Tee Balls
